column3: Commenced the MED SPAD study to survey alcohol and drugs among adolesents.

column2: Reducing the negative consequences of drinking and alcohol intoxication
column3: Applied the judicial authority for the enactment of the provisions of the 1974 Dahir (decree) relating to the prevention of drug-trafficking.
Created the National Strategy Against Alcohol and Psychoactive Substances 2016-2020.
Implemented major changes in the laws and regulations governing drunk driving.
